title: Robot Hands Can Match Humans' Dexterity With New AI Smarts, Claims Nvidia
description: Nvidia is all-in when it comes to AI. Eureka helps robots learn intricate skills faster than an aspiring surgeon, and its new SteerLM wants to make human annotation in AI training a thing of the past.

title: God Mode: 9 Can't-Miss 'Starfield' Quests With the Best Stories and Rewards
description: Want to make the most of your time in Bethesda's epic sci-fi odyssey? Here are the Starfield quests that you must seek out and complete.

title: Op-ed: Social recovery is a stepping stone, not a silver bullet to the digital ownership dilemma
description:
Given that Web3 is built on the core tenet of decentralization and the removal of third-party intermediaries, why is it that most crypto users today are wed to centralized exchanges? Unfortunately, taking full ownership of your digital assets is still too difficult. Social recovery tackles this problem by offering self-custody with a little help from […]

The post Op-ed: Social recovery is a stepping stone, not a silver bullet to the digital ownership dilemma appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ripple’s Remarkable Rally: Three Wins to Nil Against the SEC
description: Ripple and XRP mark their third consecutive legal victory over the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Charges against Ripple’s CEO, Brad Garlinghouse, and Executive Chairman, Chris Larsen, have been dismissed. SEC vs. Ripple: A Turn of Events In the unfolding legal tussle between Ripple, its native cryptocurrency XRP, and the US Securities and Exchange [...]

title: What’s SEC’s Chance of Success in Appealing XRP Ruling? 3% or 14%?
description:
Prominent legal figures in the crypto community are now speculating about the U.S.  Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)’s limited chances of winning on appeal in the case with Ripple Labs. This development comes amid the recent dismissal of the trial against two Ripple executives.  In a recent tweet, attorney Jeremy Hogan argued that, by and […]

The post What’s SEC’s Chance of Success in Appealing XRP Ruling? 3% or 14%? appeared first on Coin Edition.
